setReminders([...reminders,{id:data.id,name:data.name,cost:data.cost,date:currentDate}]);}closeAddSubscriptionModal();setNewSubscriptionName('');setNewSubscriptionCost('');setNewSubscriptionReminder('monthly');setNewSubscriptionSharable(true);setNewSubscriptionAutoRenew(false);}).catch(err=>{console.error('Error
